altername_name: Dancing with the Stars: Get Your Dance On!
name: Dancing with the Stars: We Dance!
overview: Dancing with the Stars: Get Your Dance On! features all-new stars such as Mel B, Apolo Anton Ohno, Joey Fatone and Jennie Garth. Players cha-cha with new professional dancers including Derek Hough, and his sister, two-time Dancing with the Stars champion, Julianne Hough. The Wii version improves on the original with refined Wii Remote and Nunchuck controls to enact their favorite dances. Other additions include all-new special flair moves that wow the judges. Dancing with the Stars: Get Your Dance On! for Nintendo DS brings a fresh take on the rhythm game genre, complete with the ability to change outfits and swap partners at the player's whim.
